name: @zuziadev/fetch
description: @zuzia.dev/zuzia.fetch is a Promise‑based HTTP client that automatically builds request URLs, applies default headers and timeouts, and exposes request/response interceptors for flexible customization. Its modular plugin system and structured error‑handling layer ensure clean, scalable integration in both CommonJS and ESM environments.
